ICANDELO LOPHUHLISO LWEZOKHENKETHO: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO

AMAPHULO



IINDABA

USHICILELO



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Uphuhliso lokhenketho lubandakanya ukwandiswa kobunini kumashishini ezokhenketho ngeenjongo zokwandisa inani labantu amabaxhamle kweli shishini lezokhenketho, uphuhliso lwezakhono, ukudalwa kwamathuba engqesho nawobutyebi kwanokuqinisekisa ukuba ukunabela kwiphondo ngokubanzi kweli shishini

Iinkquo ke zibandakanya:

* Ukuxhaswa kwabanini-mashishini ezokhenketho, okuquka Imisebenzi Yamacandelo Anikezela Ingcebiso Kumashishini asakhasayo, akhulayo kwanalawo sele ekhulile kwezokhenketho
* Ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwamaphulo ophuhliso lwezibonelelo zokhenketho
* Iinkxaso-mali zokungenela izifundo zokhenketho njengengxenye yenkqubo yokuxhobisa ngezakhono kwanophuhliso lwezakhono
*
